

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(cowplot)
library(RColorBrewer)
library(khroma)
library(rstatix)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
```

```{r}
data <- read_csv("experiments/2025-08-27-env-chg/analysis/data/summary.csv")

data <- data %>% mutate(
  GRADIENT_MODEL = as.factor(GRADIENT_MODEL)
)
gradient_data <- data %>% filter(
  GRADIENT_MODEL == "1"
)
nk_data <- data %>% filter(
  GRADIENT_MODEL == "0"
)

gradient_data <- gradient_data %>%
  unite(
    "treatment", c(CHANGE_FREQUENCY, TOURNAMENT_SIZE)
  ) %>%
  mutate(
    treatment = case_when(
      treatment == "0_1" ~ "drift",
      treatment == "0_8" ~ "0",
      treatment == "1_8" ~ "1"
    )
  ) %>%
  mutate(
    treatment = as.factor(treatment)
  )
```

```{r}

gradient_data %>% ggplot(
  mapping = aes(y=fitness, x = treatment, fill = treatment)
) +
  geom_boxplot()

```
